originalText.text:
Highly recommend Kris/Dream Driven fitness!! Don’t hesitate to book if you already find him!
I was desperate in August/2023 and needing a change in my life. I found Kris online and start the journey without overthinking.
It completely changed my life! All my co-workers/relatives have noticed the change on me, and I actually became the most skinny/least body fat percentage in my 31 years of life:))))
It’s really rewarding because Kris provides everything you need—he is so patient, really good at explaining the postures/movements and yet pushes you through the hard core exercises. I grew arm muscles like first time in my life and had the best abs ever since.
More than this, Kris helped me with setting up good habit of life- drinking water and stay active.
Below are some pictures.
I am grateful I can have Kris as my trainer!

—Sabrina

originalText.text: Had a great experience with Kris! He worked with me on my goals, taught me the correct exercises, and also helped with nutrition. I would highly recommend!

text.text: Had a great experience with Kris! He worked with me on my goals, taught me the correct exercises, and also helped with nutrition. I would highly recommend!

originalText.text: Kris is the amazing. He is always prompt, consistently responsive, and brings the best energy to every single workout. He doesn't check out - he's there routing for you every minute of the session, and the workouts he puts together are thoughtful and dynamic - often training multiple muscle groups at once. Kris is truly invested in my success and growth. He makes sure to hold you accountable for achieving your goals every day in a positive way. He checks in, follows up with helpful tips on exercise, lifestyle, and nutrition, and adjusts workouts based on your needs and your body's response.  He is a personal trainer in both Brooklyn and Manhattan and I know he also offers group workouts and fitness classes, so if you want to bring positivity and some healthy challenge into your life - Kris is the guy to call!

originalText.text:
Kris,

I am very blessed to have met you and can’t begin to tell you how much of an impact you’ve had on my confidence and my health!

If you’re looking for a trainer that not only makes working out informative, but fun as well then Kris is that trainer. Working with him not only gave me the knowledge, and confidence I needed to achieve my strength training goal, it also gave me the motivation to achieve other goals as well. Seeing as active and charismatic as he is reminded me that training does not only make us stronger, it also makes us a better person in general.

If you’re looking to put on some weight or lose some weight, or just overall improve you physical health then hire Kris!!

originalText.text: Kris changed my life! 100% recommend to EVERYONE for personal training in Manhattan and Brooklyn. He will meet you wherever you are in your fitness journey. My goals were to lose weight and run a half marathon - in less than 6 months he helped me lose over 15lbs, gain muscle, and go from zero running to finishing the BK half! Although we met for strength and conditioning training, he was always checking in about diet, helping me plan my runs, and keeping me accountable (he goes above and beyond). Great energy, always made me feel comfortable and kept me laughing and smiling. Thank you Kris!!!
